x

| 1 |  | asclfval.a | |- A = ( algSc ` W ) |

| 3 |  | asclfval.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |

| 5 |  | asclfval.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` W ) |

| 8 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X .x. .1. ) e. _V |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( X e. K -> ( A ` X ) = ( X .x. .1. ) ) |
